Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: David R
Reviews.Content: booked hotel couple days cause city brake located city square situated close top sights madrid including paseo de la castellana bernabeu football stadium congress center plaza castilla square wellsized extremely comfortable beds bathroom hairdryer free wifi breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
